title: The Gift of Truth_DVDRip
description:
The Gift of Truth
Satsang with Vasant Swaha 


Movie: The Gift of Truth - Dharma Mountain 1th of July 2006
http://vasantswaha.net/norway/index.html
Source: DVD
Duration: 70 minutes
Language: English

Satsang... to remember the forgotten language of the heart. 
Satsang... to meet yourself.
Satsang... is now.

Satsang means to be in the company of Truth. Seekers and lovers coming together in this atmosphere of openness and love, ready to receive and become the divine nectar of silence and celebration. 

Like a seed becoming a flower, flowers of counsciousness bloom in the climate of Truth, effortlessly. 

In this DVD Swaha talks about the eastern traditioin of the mystics. The Eternal Truth that is beating in every heart. He also comments on the poems of Kabir. And much more... A taste of how it is to be in Satsang with Vasant Swaha.
